original_text: But when Paul made his appeal to be held over for the Emperor’s decision, I ordered him held until I could send him to Caesar.”
korean_text: 바울은 황제의 판결을 받도록 자기를 지켜 주기를 호소하므로 내가 그를 가이사에게 보내기까지 지켜 두라 명하였노라 하니

sentences.original_text: But when Paul made his appeal
to be held over for the Emperor's decision
until I could send him to Caesar
